name: In re Frederick EVANS v. Michael WENEROWICZ, Superintendent, et al. Petition of Frederick Evans

parties: In re Frederick EVANS v. Michael WENEROWICZ, Superintendent, et al. Petition of Frederick Evans.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of August, 2011, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
In re Frederick EVANS v. Michael WENEROWICZ, Superintendent, et al. Petition of Frederick Evans.
No. 19 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 11, 2011.
